childnodes.sy: Harry’s Pizzeria serves a different kind of pizza and soup every day of the week, so always check out the specials. And be sure to get the out-of-this-world polenta fries served with tomato jam.

A darling of foodies and food writers, Proof Pizza lives up to its reputation with phenomenal dishes like the foie gras pasta, angel hair with crab, and any of the pizzas – the crust is definitely something to write home about.

For a tasty lunch with a side of people watching, head to Spris on Lincoln Road. They offer an extensive pizza menu, along with other Italian & Mediterranean dishes. Quick service makes this a perfect lunch spot for office workers with limited time.

For Neapolitan-style pizza in Little River, head to Iron Side. A ton of great white and red sauce pizza options offers something to please everybody, and the fresh artichoke, parmesan and pine nut salad is fantastic, too.

Just because pizza is the cuisine of choice for stoners, lazy people & drunks doesn’t mean it isn’t awesome. Steve’s Pizza serves up slices with a perfectly soft and crunchy crust and a sweet, tangy sauce. If you love meat, order the Steve’s Special.

There’s a reason Frankie’s has been around or almost 60 years: Whether you top it with jalapeno, pepperoni, green peppers, or all three, it’s gonna be good. If you’re pressed for time to make dinner, you can even order a half-baked or frozen pie.
